snippet.title: Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk - Puppet Show Trailer (Switch, PS4, Steam)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ LabyrinthofRefrain.com
Preorder now! https://store.nisamerica.com/preorders/labyrinth-of-refrain-coven-of-dusk

Danger lies around every corner in the newest RPG from the creators of Disgaea!

In our Puppet Show Trailer, learn about why Dusk Witch Dronya and her apprentice Luca have arrived in Refrain. What secrets does the little town possess? Create a brigade of puppet soldiers and explore the expansive, miasma-filled labyrinth. With the aid of the living book, the Tractatus de Monstrum, what will Dronya and her coven discover?

Enjoy a brand-new RPG experience in this highly-anticipated title from Nippon Ichi Software. Embark on a tale of a lifetime and uncover the truth behind the Labyrinth of Refrain.
